body:
Overview

Promotional emails are used to keep the eligible candidates engaged until the event day and ensure a good turnout.

Review and Edit the Emails

It is recommended that you review and edit these emails to align with your communication strategy and brand tone.

  1. Click the Outreach tab. The Campaigns tab displays the Recommended Emails for the candidates.
  2. Click the edit icon.
  3. Edit the email you will be sending out to the candidates in your preferred tone and click on Save to keep your campaigns ready.

Start the Campaign

  1. Click Start Campaign to start the campaign.
  2. A confirm prompt is displayed to start the campaign after you have previewed all the emails in your campaign.
  3. Click Next.
  4. Click Start Now to start the campaign.

    Important: You will not be able to modify or stop the campaign once it has started.
title: Set Up the Promotional Emails or Campaigns
